title: Skin Preview Tool Bannable?

embed.description: Real-time Using SkinPreview in Garena lol // Riot lol (NA/EU/RU/JP/KR/OCE/PBE): /------------------------------- Change logs --------------------------

body:
I found this skin tool that allows you to use custom and Riot made skins, is this bannable please, before I decide to use it? It only changes the skin client side and as far as I know does not alter original files in any way.

Official confirmation would be great.

Thanks.

replies.body: We do not support any third party programs or modifications.  We wouldn't be able to provide any technical support if it causes an issue with your game, and we cannot guarantee safety in case of any malicious content hidden.  Check out our [stance on third party apps](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848), and be wary of what you select!

so we can use apps to try some skins, but not apps which give us technical adventage (summeners spells timers, auto-move program, etc.)
Skinpreview is then legal
at less the users of skinpreview will recive a warning before getting banned i guess...
